strengths: Excellent accessibility implementation with ARIA labels and screen reader support
Strong mobile-first responsive design with pull-to-refresh and swipe gestures
Comprehensive form validation with real-time feedback
Good loading states and skeleton screens throughout
Strong i18n support with multiple languages
Progressive Web App features (PWA) with offline support
criticalConcerns: No comprehensive search functionality UI visible
Limited filtering options on mobile devices
executiveSummary.recommendedPriority: Focus on critical e-commerce features first: search UX, product comparison, and mobile filtering experience

issues.title: Social login options not visible
issues.description: Login page shows 'Or continue with' divider and magic link option, but no Google/Apple/Facebook social login buttons are implemented
issues.impact: Users expect modern social login options; their absence may cause friction and reduce conversion
issues.recommendation: Implement social authentication buttons (Google, Apple, Facebook) or remove the misleading divider text

issues.title: Password strength indicator could be more prominent
issues.description: Register page has PasswordStrengthMeter component but it may not be visually prominent enough during initial password entry
issues.impact: Users may create weak passwords if they don't notice the strength indicator
issues.recommendation: Make password strength indicator more prominent with color coding and position above the input

issues.title: Loading states lack visual progress feedback
issues.description: Login and registration forms show spinning loader but no percentage or text indicating what's happening
issues.impact: Users may be uncertain if the process is working, especially on slow connections
issues.recommendation: Add text feedback like 'Signing in...' or 'Creating account...' below the spinner

issues.title: Email verification status not clearly communicated
issues.description: After registration, users are redirected but may not clearly understand they need to verify their email
issues.impact: Users may be confused about why they can't access certain features or may miss the verification email
issues.recommendation: Add a dedicated email verification pending page with clear instructions and resend option

issues.title: Hero section lacks clear primary CTA hierarchy
issues.description: Homepage uses component-based approach (HomeHeroSection) but visual hierarchy of CTAs may not be clear
issues.impact: Users may not know what action to take first, reducing conversion rate
issues.recommendation: Ensure hero section has one dominant CTA (e.g., 'Shop Now') and secondary actions are visually subordinate

issues.title: Many component splits may impact initial load
issues.description: Homepage loads 10+ separate components which could impact initial page load time
issues.impact: Slower initial page load, especially on mobile connections
issues.recommendation: Consider lazy loading below-fold components and optimizing critical rendering path

issues.title: Search input lacks autocomplete/suggestions
issues.description: Product search shows only basic text input without autocomplete, recent searches, or suggested products
issues.impact: Users struggle to find products efficiently, especially with misspellings or unclear product names
issues.recommendation: Implement autocomplete dropdown with product suggestions, categories, and search history

issues.title: Filter panel hidden on mobile requires extra tap
issues.description: Mobile users must tap 'Filters' button to open side panel, hiding products entirely during filtering
issues.impact: Poor mobile UX; users can't see results while adjusting filters
issues.recommendation: Implement bottom sheet or inline filters for mobile, allowing users to see results while filtering

issues.title: No product comparison feature available
issues.description: Users cannot compare multiple products side-by-side to make informed purchasing decisions
issues.impact: Users must manually remember details or open multiple tabs, leading to decision fatigue and abandoned carts
issues.recommendation: Add 'Compare' checkbox on product cards and comparison view showing specs side-by-side

issues.title: No quick view/preview modal for products
issues.description: Users must navigate to full product page to see basic details, interrupting browsing flow
issues.impact: Slower product discovery; users lose browsing context when viewing details
issues.recommendation: Add quick view modal triggered by eye icon on product cards showing key info and add-to-cart

issues.title: Product images lack zoom/lightbox functionality
issues.description: Product detail page shows images but no way to zoom in or view in lightbox for detail inspection
issues.impact: Users cannot inspect product details closely, especially for wine labels or food packaging
issues.recommendation: Add click-to-zoom or lightbox modal for product images with pinch-to-zoom on mobile

issues.title: No 'Load More' option for continuous scrolling
issues.description: Products use traditional pagination which interrupts browsing flow
issues.impact: Users must click through pages, disrupting browsing momentum
issues.recommendation: Add 'Load More' button or infinite scroll as alternative to pagination

issues.title: Active filter chips lack visual grouping
issues.description: Filter chips show individually but not grouped by type (e.g., all price filters together)
issues.impact: Users may have difficulty understanding which filters are applied
issues.recommendation: Group filter chips by category with visual separators or labels

issues.title: Wishlist/favorites functionality not implemented
issues.description: Product detail page has wishlist toggle but no persistent wishlist view or management
issues.impact: Users cannot save products for later consideration, missing key e-commerce feature
issues.recommendation: Implement persistent wishlist with dedicated page and cross-device sync for logged-in users

issues.title: Bundle/frequently bought together section incomplete
issues.description: Product page shows bundle section but functionality appears basic
issues.impact: Missed upsell opportunities and reduced average order value
issues.recommendation: Enhance bundle feature with actual frequently bought data and one-click add-all functionality

issues.title: No estimated delivery date in cart
issues.description: Cart shows items and prices but doesn't show when items will arrive
issues.impact: Users can't make informed decisions about urgency, may abandon if they need items by specific date
issues.recommendation: Add estimated delivery date range next to each item or shipping method

issues.title: Promo code input not prominently displayed
issues.description: No visible promo/coupon code input in cart summary
issues.impact: Users with discount codes may struggle to find where to enter them
issues.recommendation: Add expandable promo code section in cart summary above total

issues.title: Cart item quantities lack inline validation feedback
issues.description: Quantity changes update but don't show validation errors immediately (e.g., stock limits)
issues.impact: Users may try to checkout with invalid quantities, causing errors later
issues.recommendation: Add inline validation showing stock limits and immediate feedback on quantity changes

issues.title: Mobile sticky summary partially obscures action buttons
issues.description: Fixed bottom cart summary on mobile (128px height) may overlap with content
issues.impact: Users may struggle to interact with cart items on small screens
issues.recommendation: Add dynamic padding to content based on sticky summary height, or use slide-up summary

issues.title: Bulk operations lack clear visual feedback
issues.description: CartBulkOperations component exists but selection feedback may not be obvious
issues.impact: Users may not realize they can select multiple items for batch actions
issues.recommendation: Add visual selection indicators (checkboxes with count badge) and action toolbar

issues.title: Address form doesn't support autofill/autocomplete
issues.description: Shipping address form may not have proper autocomplete attributes for browser autofill
issues.impact: Users must manually type entire address, significantly increasing checkout friction
issues.recommendation: Add proper autocomplete attributes (address-level1, postal-code, etc.) to all address fields

issues.title: No progress indicator showing checkout steps
issues.description: Users navigate through checkout steps but can't see overall progress or jump between steps
issues.impact: Users feel lost in checkout process, uncertain how many steps remain
issues.recommendation: Add step indicator showing: Shipping (1/4) → Payment (2/4) → Review (3/4) → Complete (4/4)

issues.title: No trust badges or security indicators during payment
issues.description: Payment page lacks SSL indicators, security badges, or payment icons to build trust
issues.impact: Users may abandon checkout due to security concerns, especially first-time buyers
issues.recommendation: Add security badges (SSL, payment processor logos, money-back guarantee) near payment form

issues.title: Guest checkout requires email upfront without explanation
issues.description: Guest users must provide email before seeing shipping options or total cost
issues.impact: Users may abandon if forced to share email before seeing complete pricing
issues.recommendation: Show complete pricing first, then ask for email before payment step

issues.title: Payment errors may not clearly explain next steps
issues.description: Error handling exists but may not guide users on how to resolve payment issues
issues.impact: Users with payment failures don't know whether to retry, use different card, or contact support
issues.recommendation: Provide specific error messages with actionable next steps (e.g., 'Card declined - try different card')

issues.title: Review step may lack edit capabilities
issues.description: Users at review step may not be able to easily edit shipping or payment without going back
issues.impact: Users must navigate back through steps to make changes, adding friction
issues.recommendation: Add inline edit buttons for shipping address and payment method on review page

issues.title: Profile picture upload lacks crop/resize tool
issues.description: Users can upload profile pictures but can't crop or adjust before saving
issues.impact: Profile pictures may look awkward if not properly sized
issues.recommendation: Add image cropping tool before upload with preset aspect ratio

issues.title: Email field disabled without explanation
issues.description: Email field is disabled with small text explanation that may be missed
issues.impact: Users may be confused why they can't edit email
issues.recommendation: Make explanation more prominent or add tooltip icon explaining why email can't be changed

issues.title: Order list lacks quick status filters
issues.description: Users must scroll through all orders to find specific status (pending, shipped, delivered)
issues.impact: Difficult to quickly find orders needing attention
issues.recommendation: Add status filter chips at top (All, Processing, Shipped, Delivered, Cancelled)

issues.title: No direct customer support contact from order page
issues.description: Order detail page lacks quick way to contact support about specific order
issues.impact: Users with order issues must find support contact separately
issues.recommendation: Add 'Contact Support' button that pre-fills order number in contact form

issues.title: Reorder functionality incomplete
issues.description: Reorder button exists but implementation is TODO/incomplete
issues.impact: Users cannot easily repurchase previous orders, missing convenience feature
issues.recommendation: Complete reorder implementation to add all order items to cart with one click

issues.title: Cannot set multiple default addresses
issues.description: Address system allows only one default address, not separate billing/shipping defaults
issues.impact: Users with different billing/shipping addresses must manually select each time
issues.recommendation: Allow separate default addresses for billing and shipping

issues.title: Mobile menu closes on every navigation
issues.description: Mobile menu closes when any link is tapped, even for hierarchical navigation
issues.impact: Users must reopen menu for each navigation action in sub-menus
issues.recommendation: Keep menu open for category navigation, only close on final product/page selection

issues.title: Search icon navigates to products page instead of opening search
issues.description: Header search icon navigates to /products?focus=search instead of inline search
issues.impact: Users expecting inline search are taken to different page, breaking expectation
issues.recommendation: Add inline search dropdown in header, or make search icon behavior more obvious

issues.title: Account icon not differentiated for logged in vs logged out
issues.description: Account icon looks the same whether user is logged in or not
issues.impact: Users can't quickly see if they're logged in
issues.recommendation: Change account icon to user avatar or add indicator badge when logged in

issues.title: Mobile menu doesn't trap focus properly
issues.description: When mobile menu opens, focus may not be managed correctly for keyboard/screen reader users
issues.impact: Keyboard and screen reader users cannot properly navigate mobile menu
issues.recommendation: Implement focus trap and proper focus management when menu opens/closes

strengths: Excellent mobile-first approach with Tailwind breakpoints
Proper touch target sizes (44px minimum) on mobile
Swipe gestures for pagination on mobile

issues.title: Tablet layout uses mobile view instead of optimized layout
issues.description: Breakpoints jump from mobile to desktop, missing tablet-optimized views
issues.impact: Wasted screen space on tablets, suboptimal product grid density
issues.recommendation: Add md: breakpoint optimizations for tablet views (768px-1024px)

strengths: Screen reader announcements for dynamic content
High contrast mode support via dark theme

issues.title: Filter panel lacks proper keyboard trap
issues.description: Mobile filter panel may not trap focus properly when open
issues.impact: Keyboard users can tab out of modal into background content
issues.recommendation: Implement focus trap when filter panel is open

issues.title: Some secondary text may not meet WCAG AA contrast
issues.description: Gray-400 text on white background may not meet 4.5:1 contrast ratio
issues.impact: Users with low vision may struggle to read secondary information
issues.recommendation: Audit all text-gray-400 usage and darken to text-gray-500 or text-gray-600

strengths: Clear error messages with specific guidance
Success states shown for valid inputs

issues.title: No confirmation for destructive actions
issues.description: Some destructive actions (delete address, remove from cart) lack confirmation dialogs
issues.impact: Users may accidentally delete data without warning
issues.recommendation: Add confirmation dialogs for all destructive actions with clear cancel option

strengths: Disabled state styling for buttons during loading
Loading state indicators in cart and checkout

issues.title: No optimistic UI updates for cart operations
issues.description: Cart add/remove operations wait for server response before updating UI
issues.impact: UI feels slow even on fast connections
issues.recommendation: Implement optimistic updates with rollback on error

issues.title: Generic error messages don't provide actionable guidance
issues.description: Many error messages show technical details instead of user-friendly guidance
issues.impact: Users don't know how to resolve errors or when to contact support
issues.recommendation: Create error message dictionary with user-friendly messages and next steps

issues: CHECK-003: Add trust badges to checkout
NAV-004: Fix mobile menu focus trap

phase3_medium.title: Polish & Optimization (Week 5-6)
issues: AUTH-001: Add social login or remove misleading UI

issues: PROD-007: Group filter chips by category

recommendations.title: Implement Autocomplete Search
recommendations.description: Add real-time search suggestions with product previews, category suggestions, and search history

recommendations.title: Add Product Comparison
recommendations.description: Allow users to select multiple products and view side-by-side comparison

recommendations.title: Implement Quick View
recommendations.description: Modal overlay showing key product details without leaving browse page

recommendations.title: Add Checkout Progress Indicator
recommendations.description: Visual stepper showing current position in checkout flow

recommendations.title: Implement Address Autocomplete
recommendations.description: Use Google Places API or similar for address suggestions

recommendations.title: Add Trust & Security Elements
recommendations.description: Display SSL badge, payment logos, money-back guarantee

recommendations.title: Improve Mobile Filtering
recommendations.description: Convert to bottom sheet with live results preview

recommendations.title: Fix Sticky Elements
recommendations.description: Ensure sticky cart summary doesn't overlap content

Missing test coverage for some components
